Class FirebaseRegistrationStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.example.ezvault.data.authentication.registration.FirebaseRegistrationStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class FirebaseRegistrationStrategy extends Object implements IRegistrationStrategy
Represents a registration strategy that involves accessing firebase
